param.name: numOfLinksToDisplay
param.label: Number of Listings shown in Index
param.description: The number of listings to be shown under each root Category

param.name: displayIndexCatCount
param.label: Show number of categories in Index

param.name: displayIndexListingCount
param.label: Show number of listings in Index

param.name: displaySubcatsCatCount
param.label: Show number of categories in Subcat

param.name: displaySubcatsListingCount
param.label: Show number of listings in Subcat

param.name: displayAddressInOneRow
param.label: Show address, city, state, country and postcode in one row
param.description: In order for this feature to work properly, you need to publish the 'Address' field.

param.name: showActionLinksInSummary
param.label: Show action links in summary view.
param.description: Select Yes if you would like to show action links in summary view. eg: Submit Review, Recommend, Print, Contact Owner, Visit, Report, Owner's Listing & Map.

param.name: imageDirectionListingSummary
param.label: Direction of thumbnailed image at Listing Summary

param.name: onlyShowRootLevelCatInListalpha
param.label: Only show root level category in listalpha
param.description: If you have a large number of categories, turning on this feature will decrease the number of categories shown in listalpha by only showing root level categories.

param.name: useFeaturedHighlight
param.label: Highlight featured listing
param.description: Using highlight will display a border and a different background color to a featured listing in summary view.
